thread.title: Supreme Court nomination hearing for Neil Gorsuch gets started
thread.title_full: Supreme Court nomination hearing for Neil Gorsuch gets started

author: Mark K. Matthews
title: Supreme Court nomination hearing for Neil Gorsuch gets started
text: Trump’s visits to Mar-a-Lago stretching Palm Beach’s budget and locals’ patience March 20, 2017, 8:22 am It is high season in South Florida: blue skies, low humidity, warm temperatures and increasingly regular visits from the president of the United States. Comey: FBI probing links between Russia, Trump associates March 20, 2017, 9:57 am President Donald Trump on Monday accused Democrats of making up allegations that Russia interfered in last year’s election, and said Congress and the FBI should be going after media leaks instead. White House installs political aides at Cabinet agencies to monitor loyalty to Trump March 20, 2017, 6:12 am The unusual shadow government of political appointees, which reports to the White House deputy chief of staff for policy, is charged with making sure the secretaries and their staff members carry out President Trump’s agenda and stick to approved talking points, according to officials with knowledge of the arrangement. Michael Bennet squeezed in Neil Gorsuch fight March 20, 2017, 9:33 am With confirmation hearings set to start Monday for Judge Neil Gorsuch, a broad range of activists and politicos have turned up the heat on U.S. Sen. Michael Bennet to decide whether he’ll support his fellow Coloradan for the Supreme Court.
